body_html:
ROCm failures look legit?

0:57:50 Generating AMD GCN kernel failed in llc for target: gfx900
00:57:50 /opt/rocm/hcc/bin/llc: /tmp/tmp.0PiILY6VCc/caffe2_hip_generated_BatchNorm.cpp.kernel.bc-gfx900.isabin.opt.bc: error: Could not open input file: No such file or directory
00:57:50 clang-7.0_original: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
00:57:50 Died at /opt/rocm/hip/bin/hipcc line 565.
00:57:50 caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/build.make:2248: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2_hip.so' failed

Also note to fb people: this diff needs fbcode changes

body:
ROCm failures look legit?

```
0:57:50 Generating AMD GCN kernel failed in llc for target: gfx900
00:57:50 /opt/rocm/hcc/bin/llc: /tmp/tmp.0PiILY6VCc/caffe2_hip_generated_BatchNorm.cpp.kernel.bc-gfx900.isabin.opt.bc: error: Could not open input file: No such file or directory

00:57:50 Died at /opt/rocm/hip/bin/hipcc line 565.
00:57:50 caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/build.make:2248: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2_hip.so' failed
```

Also note to fb people: this diff needs fbcode changes
